name: Stellar Ballz!
description:
Left and Right Arrows to move

Z to Attack

Green Flag to Restart

NOTE: If the controls arent working, please reload the page!

The Infernuz Ballz are attacking the Ballz Planet! You must defeat the Infernuz Ballz and save the planet!

NOTE: The game is still in beta phases! 

Update Log:

Beta 1: Game Realese

Beta 2: Changed the win mechanics:

 -Everytime the Enemy lifes drops to 0, it will remove the first item of the list and the enemy life will be restored to X according to the first item of the Enemy Life list, that contains 9 of them. If you defeat them all, and all the items of the list get deleted, you win.

 -You get a +1 life bonus after dropping the enemy life to 0. This will help you prepare to the next one that haves more lifes.

Beta 3: 

 -Added a main menu theme.

 -There's a chance of a Health Ball appear falling. If you touch it, you get +1 life.

 -When you defeat one enemy, the enemy will hide and the next one with more lifes will appear. This gives a fell of an enemy swarm coming to destroy the Ballz Planet.

-Beta 3.1: You wont get a extra life after defeating one enemy. This happens because of a bug that gives more life than expected. Your only source of life is Health Ballz.

Music and SFX made by me
